settings.text:
The Lacoste L003 2K24 224 2 SMA embodies modern elegance and innovative functionality. This model, inspired by Lacoste's traditional connection between sport and fashion, is a tribute to the urban lifestyle and the dynamic energy of modern times

The sneaker is made from a high-quality combination of suede, mesh and synthetic leather. The premium upper is breathable yet robust, making it ideal for everyday wear. The flexible rubber sole provides optimum grip and comfort and has a grippy profile. The inner lining is soft and adaptable to ensure maximum comfort.

The creative design of the Lacoste L003 2K24 is a successful fusion of futuristic style and timeless minimalism. Clean lines, a slim silhouette and eye-catching details such as the Lacoste Active branding on the upper characterize the shoe. The iconic Lacoste crocodile logo is embroidered on the tongue. The model's color palette is versatile and modern, ideal for different styles. The dynamically designed midsole in particular emphasizes the sporty character. The shiny plastic insert as reinforcement is another visual highlight.

The L003 2K24 was designed with Ren√© Lacoste's legacy in mind, who was not only a tennis icon but also a visionary in sports fashion. The sneaker reflects Lacoste's pursuit of perfection and style and is a symbol of the combination of tradition and innovation. Perfect for people who value quality and style.
